## Gene Details:

- **Gene Symbol:** <u>ARR22, RR22</u>
- **Gene Name:** response regulator 22, response regulator 22
- **Description:**   response regulator 22;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** locus:2102960
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*

## Germplasm Phenotype:
   - [ARR22 KO]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;There are no detectable phenotypic differences between this mutant and wild-type plants grown under normal conditions
   - [ARR22 KO ARR24 KO]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;There are no consistently detectable phenotypic differences between this double mutant and wild-type plants grown under normal conditions.
   - [arr22-2]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;This mutant does not have any defects in vegetative development. Careful examinations of arr22-2 and wild type plants reveal no noticeable difference in chalazal cell morphology or size, embryonic development, silique dry weight, or silique inorganic ion, carbohydrate, or amino acid content.
   - [arr22-3]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;This mutant does not have any defects in vegetative development. Careful examinations of arr22-3 and wild type plants reveal no noticeable difference in chalazal cell morphology or size, embryonic development, silique dry weight, or silique inorganic ion, carbohydrate, or amino acid content.
